  "description": "Bridgegap Consults Limited has been providing multidisciplinary professional services to both local and international organisations since 2008. Our vision is to be recognised as the best Human Resource and Business consulting company in Nigeria. Top-quality service requires top-quality people, so attracting the best talent is a commitment for Bridgegap. At Bridgegap, we are committed to working with clients through the complexities of finding solutions and then adding value to the business world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Human Resources
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced and strategic Head of HR to lead all HR functions within the organization.
	The ideal candidate will oversee recruitment, employee relations, performance management, and HR policy development while ensuring compliance with labor regulations.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee end-to-end HR operations including recruitment, onboarding, performance management, and employee engagement.
	Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and strategies to support organizational growth.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, statutory requirements, and HR best practices.
	Lead workforce planning, talent development, succession planning, and retention initiatives.
	Provide guidance to management on HR matters, including conflict resolution and organizational development.
	Manage compensation and benefits structures to attract and retain top talent.
	Maintain HR analytics and prepare reports to support decision-making.
	Supervise and mentor the HR team to drive efficiency and professionalism.


Requirements


	B.Sc. or HND in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Relations, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 &ndash; 7 years of experience in Human Resources, with at least 2 years in a managerial or leadership role.
	HR certification is mandatory (e.g., CIPM, SHRM).
	Strong leadership, communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Experience in HR consulting or professional services is a strong advantage.


Salary
N400,000 &ndash; N500,000 / month.




Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;CV to:&nbsp;skareem@bridgegapconsults.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Head of HR &ndash; Lekki&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",

        Bridgegap Consults Limited has been providing multidisciplinary professional services to both local and international organisations since 2008. Our vision is to be recognised as the best Human Resource and Business consulting company in Nigeria. Top-quality service requires top-quality people, so attracting the best talent is a commitment for Bridgegap. At Bridgegap, we are committed to working with clients through the complexities of finding solutions and then adding value to the business world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Human Resources
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	We are seeking an experienced and strategic Head of HR to lead all HR functions within the organization.
	The ideal candidate will oversee recruitment, employee relations, performance management, and HR policy development while ensuring compliance with labor regulations.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee end-to-end HR operations including recruitment, onboarding, performance management, and employee engagement.
	Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and strategies to support organizational growth.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, statutory requirements, and HR best practices.
	Lead workforce planning, talent development, succession planning, and retention initiatives.
	Provide guidance to management on HR matters, including conflict resolution and organizational development.
	Manage compensation and benefits structures to attract and retain top talent.
	Maintain HR analytics and prepare reports to support decision-making.
	Supervise and mentor the HR team to drive efficiency and professionalism.


Requirements


	B.Sc. or HND in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Relations, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 – 7 years of experience in Human Resources, with at least 2 years in a managerial or leadership role.
	HR certification is mandatory (e.g., CIPM, SHRM).

Job Brief

	Demonstrable experience in marketing together with the potential and attitude required to learn
